def open_or_create_note():
    # First, attempt to open any existing note
    tap($open_note) 
    note_list = $open_note_title_list
    if len(note_list) > 0:
        tap(note_list[0])
    else:
        # If no notes exist, create a new note
        tap($create_note)
        set_text($add_note_title, "New Note")
        tap($text_note_type)
        tap($add_note_ok)

def ensure_note_exists(title):
    # Open the note list
    tap($open_note) 
    note_list = $open_note_title_list

    # Check if the note with the provided title exists
    for note in note_list:
        if get_text(note) == title:
            tap(note)
            return

    # If the note does not exist, create it
    tap($create_note)
    set_text($add_note_title, title)
    tap($text_note_type)
    tap($add_note_ok)
